plot: CBS News tribute to Louis Armstrong. Scenes from his memorial service, including Peggy Lee singing The Lord's Prayer, were shown in addition to interviews with musicians paying tribute to Armstrong.
title: Louis Armstrong: 1900 - 1971
plot_es: CBS News tribute to Louis Armstrong. Scenes from his memorial service, including Peggy Lee singing The Lord's Prayer, were shown in addition to interviews with musicians paying tribute to Armstrong.
